validation.password_length: Password must be at least 6 characters

error.server_error: Login failed. Please try again later
error.generic: An error occurred. Please try again

validation.password_requirements: Password must be at least 6 characters

error.user_exists: User with this email already exists

modal.title: Enter the URL
modal.login_title: Does this website require logging in?
modal.label: URL

warning_modal.title: Active Browser Detected
warning_modal.message: There is already a browser recording session running. Would you like to discard it and create a new recording?

notifications.delete_warning: The robot has associated runs. First delete runs to delete the robot

notifications.no_runs: No runs found. Please try again.

proxy.title: Proxy Configuration
proxy.server_url_helper: Proxy to be used for all robots. HTTP and SOCKS proxies are supported. Example http://myproxy.com:3128 or socks5://myproxy.com:3128. Short form myproxy.com:3128 is considered an HTTP proxy.
proxy.coming_soon: Coming Soon - In Open Source (Basic Rotation) & Cloud (Advanced Rotation). If you don't want to manage the infrastructure, join our cloud waitlist to get early access.

alert.title: If your proxy requires a username and password, always provide them separately from the proxy URL.

notifications.config_error: Failed to submit proxy configuration. Try again.
notifications.test_error: Failed to test proxy configuration. Try again.
notifications.remove_error: Failed to remove proxy configuration. Try again.

apikey.title: Manage Your API Key
apikey.no_key_message: You haven't generated an API key yet.

text.title: Capture Text
text.description: Hover over the texts you want to extract and click to select them

screenshot.title: Capture Screenshot
screenshot.description: Capture a partial or full page screenshot of the current page.

list.title: Capture List
list.description: Hover over the list you want to extract. Once selected, you can hover over all texts inside the list you selected. Click to select them.

default.title: What data do you want to extract?
default.description: A robot is designed to perform one action at a time. You can choose any of the options below.

list_stages.initial: Select the list you want to extract along with the texts inside it
list_stages.pagination: Select how the robot can capture the rest of the list
list_stages.limit: Choose the number of items to extract

pagination.title: How can we find the next list item on the page?
pagination.click_next: Click on next to navigate to the next page
pagination.click_load_more: Click on load more to load more items
pagination.scroll_down: Scroll down to load more items
pagination.scroll_up: Scroll up to load more items

limit.title: What is the maximum number of rows you want to extract?

messages.list_empty: List selected. Please select fields inside the list.

errors.select_pagination_element: Please select the pagination element first.
errors.select_limit: Please select a limit or enter a custom limit.
errors.unable_create_settings: Unable to create list settings. Make sure you have defined a field for the list.

errors.user_not_logged: User not logged in. Cannot save recording.
errors.exists_warning: Robot with this name already exists, please confirm the Robot's overwrite.

modal.confirm_discard: Are you sure you want to discard the recording?
modal.confirm_reset: Are you sure you want to restart the recording?
modal.reset_warning: This will clear all previous captures in the current session. The recording session will restart for the same website.

notifications.reset_successful: Successfully reset all captures and returned to initial state

messages.additional_rows: Additional rows of data will be extracted once you finish recording.
messages.successful_training: You've successfully trained the robot to perform actions! Click on the button below to get a preview of the data your robot will extract.
messages.no_selection: It looks like you have not selected anything for extraction yet. Once you do, the robot will show a preview of your selections here.

messages.restart_required: Please restart the interpretation after updating the recording

modal.use_previous: Do you want to use your previous selection as a condition for performing this action?

descriptions.sync_info: If you enable this option, every time this robot runs a task successfully, its captured data will be appended to your Google Sheet.

success.title: Google Sheet Integrated Successfully.
success.content: Every time this robot creates a successful run, its captured data is appended to your {{sheetName}} Google Sheet. You can check the data updates
success.sync_limitation: The data extracted before integrating with Google Sheets will not be synced in the Google Sheet. Only the data extracted after the integration will be synced.

descriptions.sync_info: If you enable this option, every time this robot runs a task successfully, its captured data will be appended to your Airtable Base.
descriptions.authenticated_as: Authenticated with Airtable successfully. You can now select the base and table to integrate with.

success.title: Airtable Base Integrated Successfully
success.content: Every time this robot creates a successful run, its captured data is appended to your {{baseName}} Base and {{tableName}} Table. You can check updates
success.sync_limitation: Only data captured after integration will be synced to Airtable.

descriptions.purpose: Robot duplication is useful to extract data from pages with the same structure.
descriptions.example: Example: If you've created a robot for {{url1}}, you can duplicate it to scrape similar pages like {{url2}} without training a robot from scratch.
descriptions.warning: ⚠️ Ensure the new page has the same structure as the original page.

notifications.robot_not_found: Could not find robot details. Please try again.
notifications.duplicate_error: Failed to update the Target URL. Please try again.
notifications.unknown_error: An error occurred while updating the Target URL.

errors.robot_not_found: Could not find robot details. Please try again.

notifications.update_failed: Failed to update the robot. Please try again.
notifications.update_error: An error occurred while updating the robot.

notifications.abort_failed: Failed to abort the interpretation of robot {{name}}

notifications.list_select_success: List has been successfully selected. Please select the text data to extract.
notifications.pagination_select_success: Pagination element has been successfully selected.

run_content.loading: Run in progress. Extracted data will appear here once run completes.

logout.unauthorized: You are not authorized to perform this action
logout.unknown: An unexpected error occurred during logout

modal.new_version_available: A new version is available: {{version}}. Upgrade to the latest version for bug fixes, enhancements and new features!
